message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its value to you, I believe it's worth more than $10,000. Considering its true worth, I propose we start negotiations at $12,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I had a lower price point in mind. How about we meet halfway at $11,000?
Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product and aiming for mutual benefit, I would like to propose a price of $11,500.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me on this.  To be honest, $11,000 is really the highest I can go. If you're unable to do that, I might have to explore other options.
I understand your position, Bob. In light of this, I am prepared to offer the product at $11,250. This allows us to both achieve a fair transaction.
Alice, this is getting very close to what I can do. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $11,125.  If we can make that work, I think we have a deal.
